commitments.commitment: Set up Wade's GPU to mine at night to get Ergo
commitments.quote: So I think, Wade, what we'll have to do is I'll have to come over at some point and we can set up your GPU to maybe mine at night so we can start getting your Ergo coming in.

commitments.commitment: Have Wade on the podcast in the future to share his experience
commitments.quote: All right, we'll have you on in the future and you can tell us your experience as a fresh set of eyes.

open_questions.question: What is the difference between energy cost versus mining outputs for Wade's setup
open_questions.context: Wade expressing interest in mining but wanting to understand economics

key_facts.fact: 70% of all dollars were printed in the past five years
key_facts.speaker: tmr.erg

key_facts.fact: Ergo team received 4% of all tokens in allocation
key_facts.speaker: tmr.erg

key_facts.fact: Ethereum gas fees can be $20 to $100 per transaction
key_facts.speaker: Marc the Shark
